metadata.title: CVE-2024-38624 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Use 64 bit variable to avoid 32 bit overflow For example, in theexpression: vbo = 2 * vbo + skip
